shortDescription: Craft engaging, high-quality videos that simplify real estate insights, elevate brand storytelling, and connect with audiences across digital platforms.
longDescription:
Video Editor – Job Description

At My Property Fact, content is at the heart of how we simplify complex real estate decisions for millions. As a Video Editor, you will transform raw footage into powerful, engaging, and story-driven videos that educate, inspire, and connect with our audience across platforms. From short social media reels to in-depth explainers, your edits will give shape to our brand’s voice and vision.

Key Responsibilities

  • Edit and produce high-quality videos, including explainers, property walkthroughs, interviews, and promotional campaigns.
  • Craft engaging storytelling by combining graphics, animations, sound, and visual effects.
  • Adapt content into multiple formats optimized for YouTube, Instagram, LinkedIn, and other digital platforms.
  • Collaborate with the content, design, and marketing teams to execute campaigns aligned with brand goals.
  • Maintain a consistent visual identity while experimenting with creative editing techniques.
  • Stay updated with video editing trends, tools, and best practices in digital storytelling.

Requirements & Skills

  • 2–5 years of professional video editing experience.
  • Strong command of Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and related tools.
  • A keen eye for storytelling, pacing, and visual design.
  • Knowledge of real estate or finance content is a plus.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

At MPF, your edits won’t just inform — they’ll inspire trust and shape how people see real estate.

shortDescription: Create compelling, informative, and SEO-optimized content that educates property seekers, inspires investors, and strengthens My Property Fact’s digital authority.
longDescription:
Content Writer – Job Description

At My Property Fact, words are more than communication; they’re how we simplify real estate, empower investors, and build trust. As a Content Writer, you will create compelling, informative, and SEO-optimized content that drives engagement and strengthens our brand’s digital authority. Your work will help property seekers, developers, and investors make confident decisions in a complex market.

Key Responsibilities

  • Write clear, engaging, and accurate content across blogs, articles, web pages, and marketing campaigns.
  • Develop scripts for videos, social media captions, and newsletters aligned with brand strategy.
  • Research and analyze real estate trends to deliver insightful, data-backed narratives.
  • Collaborate with design, video, and SEO teams to produce integrated campaigns.
  • Optimize content for search engines, ensuring discoverability and organic reach.
  • Maintain brand tone of voice while adapting to different platforms and audiences.

Requirements & Skills

  • 2–5 years of professional writing experience; real estate or finance domain knowledge preferred.
  • Strong command of English, with excellent grammar and storytelling ability.
  • Familiarity with SEO practices and digital publishing tools.
  • Ability to simplify complex topics for diverse audiences.
  • Creative mindset with a passion for research-driven content.

At MPF, your words will not just inform, they’ll guide India’s next wave of property decisions.

shortDescription: Build intuitive, high-performance user interfaces that bring our real estate data solutions to life with seamless, interactive experiences.
longDescription:
React Developer – Job Description

At My Property Fact, we’re reimagining how people explore and invest in real estate, powered by data, design, and cutting-edge tech. As a React Developer, you’ll be the driving force behind creating seamless, lightning-fast, and interactive user experiences that make complex property insights simple, intuitive, and engaging.

Key Responsibilities

  • Build and maintain high-performance, scalable, and responsive web applications using React.js.
  • Translate UI/UX designs into interactive, user-friendly interfaces.
  • Optimize performance for speed, reusability, and cross-browser compatibility.
  • Collaborate closely with designers, backend engineers, and product teams to deliver pixel-perfect solutions.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code that scales.
  • Experiment, innovate, and bring fresh ideas to improve product usability and performance.

Requirements & Skills

  • 2–5 years of experience in front-end development with React.js.
  • Strong understanding of JavaScript (ES6+), Redux, Hooks, and RESTful APIs.
  • Familiarity with modern build pipelines, testing frameworks, and version control (Git).
  • Passion for UI/UX, performance optimization, and delivering smooth user journeys.
  • Startup mindset, self-motivated, problem-solver, and eager to build impactful products.

At MPF, you won’t just code; you’ll shape the digital gateway to India’s smartest real estate insights.

shortDescription: Develop robust, scalable, and user-friendly web platforms that power My Property Fact’s innovative tools and property insights ecosystem.
longDescription:
Web Developer – Job Description

At My Property Fact, our mission is to make real estate smarter, transparent, and technology-driven. As a Web Developer, you’ll play a key role in building robust, scalable, and user-friendly platforms that power our data insights, property tools, and digital experiences. Your code will be the backbone of solutions that help thousands make better property decisions.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop, test, and maintain high-quality, responsive web applications.
  • Collaborate with designers and product teams to create seamless user journeys.
  • Integrate APIs, databases, and third-party tools to enhance platform functionality.
  • Optimize applications for maximum speed, performance, and scalability.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and continuously improve web features.
  • Ensure security, data protection, and best practices in coding.

Requirements & Skills

  • 2–5 years of experience in web development (front-end + back-end).
  • Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and frameworks like Node.js or React.
  • Experience with databases (MySQL, MongoDB) and RESTful APIs.
  • Strong problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
  • Ability to work in a collaborative, fast-paced environment.

At MPF, you won’t just build websites; you’ll build the foundation of India’s next-generation real estate ecosystem.

shortDescription: Lead client acquisition and relationship-building, driving revenue growth by connecting My Property Fact’s solutions with developers, brokers, and property investors.
longDescription:
Sales Manager – Job Description

At My Property Fact, we’re on a mission to revolutionize real estate decisions through data-driven insights, technology, and transparency. As a Sales Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth by connecting our innovative solutions with developers, brokers, and property investors. This is a high-impact role for someone who thrives in building relationships, closing deals, and leading teams towards ambitious targets.

Key Responsibilities

  • Drive business development by identifying, pitching, and converting potential clients across real estate segments.
  • Build and nurture strong relationships with developers, brokers, and investors to ensure long-term partnerships.
  • Lead the sales cycle from prospecting to closing with data-backed presentations and solutions.
  • Collaborate with the marketing and product teams to align sales strategies with business objectives.
  • Track performance metrics, generate reports, and achieve quarterly and annual sales targets.
  • Mentor and guide junior sales executives to enhance team performance.

Requirements & Skills

  • 4–8 years of experience in sales, preferably in real estate, proptech, or digital solutions.
  • Proven track record of meeting and exceeding revenue goals.
  • Strong communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced, goal-oriented environment.

At MPF, you’ll not only close deals but also shape the future of real estate decision-making in India.
